title: Live via Early Bird
creator_credit: Communications Satellite Corporation, Bill Gibson and Matthew Gordon
brief_description: A record of the performance of the first trans-ocean satellite ever to maintain constant, wr-hour communication between two continents while in orbit. Includes an animated review of each phase in the development of the communications system, future possibilities and achievements since the advent of satellites. 48 nations share benefits of the inter-continental satellite system, of which “Early Bird” is the fore-runner. Narrated by Art Balinger.
